com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI
Class LiaisonAdminToolController

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI.LiaisonAdminToolController
public class LiaisonAdminToolController
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the top level controller (or application shell ) for the Liaison Admin Tool. It is a top-level shell that performs initialization, creates and invokes the GUI, etc. Study the public fields for this class very carefully. Also, most classes that are created by this one keep a pointer to it so they can access these structures.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
